summary:
- **Acquisition Completion**: Zeus Resources completed acquisition of 100% interest in Casablanca Antimony Project (6 licenses in Morocco).  
- **Consideration**:  
  - Issued **62.5M shares** (50% escrowed for 6 months) + **12M ordinary shares** (originally performance rights, now converted due to met vesting condition).  
  - Introducer fee: **72.5M options** (exercise price $0.02, expiry Dec 2027).  
- **Key Sample Results**: High-grade antimony rock chip samples (7.8%–46.52% Sb).  
- **Top Holders**: Top 3 shareholders hold **25.88%** combined (Bakr Khudeira 10.17%, Zhengyuan 8.04%, Vast Honour 7.67%).
